title: Monster Hunter Wilds Weapons Tier List
description: Discover the top weapons in Monster Hunter Wilds with our comprehensive tier list, detailing the strengths and ideal playstyles for each weapon.
heading: Monster Hunter Wilds Weapons Tier List
introText: Discover the top weapons in Monster Hunter Wilds with our comprehensive tier list, detailing the strengths and ideal playstyles for each weapon.

data.itemDescription: Combines reach with significant power, allowing hunters to build a spirit gauge and unleash devastating attacks. Its versatility makes it effective against various monsters
Offers both long-range and close-up attacks, with evasive moves that help charge shots. The new trick arrow system imbues arrows with homing properties, enhancing its effectiveness
Features decent range, good maneuverability, and high damage. The focus mode allows for more precise aiming, making it potent for both beginners and veterans
An agile and defensive weapon that trades power for utility. Allows hunters to use items without sheathing their weapon, offering a balance between offense and defense
A support weapon that provides blunt attacks and buffs
Extremely fast weapons with a special Demon Mode that significantly increases damage. Ideal for aggressive players who prefer close combat
A versatile weapon that can switch between axe and sword forms. While it offers flexibility, it requires mastery to maximize its potential
A slow yet powerful weapon capable of stunning monsters with well-timed charged attacks. Effective for those who can anticipate monster movements
Trades mobility for great defenses and high damage. Combines the defensive capabilities of the lance with explosive attacks, suitable for methodical hunters
A defense-first weapon with decent range. Emphasizes guarding and counterattacking, making it ideal for players who prefer a cautious approach
A complicated weapon that builds power in one form to unleash it in another
A long-distance gun that hits hard but has low maneuverability
A mid-range weapon with a low learning curve
A complicated weapon that utilizes insects to power up aerial attacks
